name: Away From Earth: Titan
detailed_description:
The world is in danger. Our water is finishing, our world is finishing. We need a new world. For this, we're going to Titan. As player, you need make titan as livable. You need to make oxygen area, food places and clean water from in-side of Titan. Also to make people live there, you need to create water&electric stations by using your engineer abilities. People will need jobs. You'll need to create them too. Basically, you'll be leader of your colony.


First start with looting materials; irons, golds and diamonds. Then you'll need food and water. Create a farming area to get food&water. Then start building your colony but your colony will need electric&water. Because of that you need create electric engines and water engines and connect them with your colony houses. But don't forget, you need to use your engineer abilities to connect them. After basics done, you need to create buisness buildings for your people. These will need to be a part of ecosystem too.


  • Level One Colony House: Needs low electric and water. It can handle only one person.
  • Level Two Colony House: Needs medium electric and water. It can handle three people.
  • Level Three Colony House: Needs high electric and water. It can handle five people.
  • Car Factory: A buisness building to give your 4 of people job. Also you can get a car for your self from this building.
  • Ship Factory: A buisness building to give your 4 of people job. Basically it loots materials for you.
  • Quarry: A buisness building to give your 2 of people job. Also this place will loot materials for you.
  • Electric Engine for electric generation and a water engine for water needs.
  • 4 Types of Electric Cables.
  • 4 Types of Water Pipes.
  • Use Lazer Item Looter gun to loot materials.
  • Use destroyer gun to destroy what you've builded.
  • Fly System: You can fly wherever you want easly by pressing [F] key.

short_description: The world is in danger. Our water is running out. Our world is running out. As a player, you need to make Titan as livable and invite humans from world to Titan. By doing that, you need to use your engineer abilities to make water&electric systems of Titan. You are leader of your colony.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
